description.plain: Michael Joseph Nelson, known under the stage name Banners (styled as BANNΞRS), is an English musician from Liverpool. Banners is a singer, a songwriter and a musician as well. He plays piano and guitar. He is produced by Island Record.

body.plain: Michael Joseph Nelson, known under the stage name Banners (styled as BANNΞRS), is an English musician from Liverpool. Banners is a singer, a songwriter and a musician as well. He plays piano and guitar. He is produced by Island Record.

songs.title: Someone To You

description.plain:
Released on 9th June, 2017, “Someone to You” is BANNERS‘ first single of the year as well as the first single from his new EP, Empires on Fire.

https://twitter.com/BANNERSMUSIC/status/873205798683410432

The song is a confession of love which comments on the feelings of loneliness and invisibility when the one that you love barely recognizes your existence.

songs.embed_content: Read “Someone To You” by BANNERS on Genius

songs.lyrics:
40 ContributorsSomeone To You Lyrics[Verse 1]
I don't wanna die or fade away
I just wanna be someone
I just wanna be someone
Dive and disappear without a trace
I just wanna be someone
Well, doesn't everyone?
And if you feel the great dividing
I wanna be the one you're guiding
'Cause I believe that you could lead the way

[Pre-Chorus]
I just wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I never had nobody and no road home
I wanna be somebody to someone

[Chorus]
And if the sun starts setting, the sky goes cold
Then if the clouds get heavy and start to fall
I really need somebody to call my own
I wanna be somebody to someone
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you (Someone to you)
You might also like[Verse 2]
I don't even need to change the world (Change, change the world)
I'll make the moon shine just for your view
I'll make the starlight circle the room (Circle the room)
And if you feel like night is falling
I wanna be the one you're calling
'Cause I believe that you could lead the way

[Pre-Chorus]
I just wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I never had nobody and no road home
I wanna be somebody to someone

[Chorus]
And if the sun starts setting, the sky goes cold
Then if the clouds get heavy and start to fall
I really need somebody to call my own
I wanna be somebody to someone
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you

[Bridge]
The kingdom come, the rise, the fall
The setting sun above it all
I just wanna be somebody to you
[Pre-Chorus]
I just wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I wanna be somebody to someone, oh
I never had nobody and no road home
I wanna be somebody to someone

[Chorus]
And if the sun starts setting, the sky goes cold
Then if the clouds get heavy and start to fall
I really need somebody to call my own
I wanna be somebody to someone
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you
Someone to you

[Outro]

songs.title: Start A Riot

songs.title: Start a Riot (Thundatraxx Remix)

songs.lyrics:
20 ContributorsStart A Riot Lyrics[Verse 1]
I will march down an empty street like a ship into the storm
No surrender, no retreat
I will tear down every wall
Just to keep you warm
Just to bring you home
I will burn this city down for a diamond in the dust
I will keep you safe and sound when there's no one left to trust
Will you take my hand?
We can make our stand

[Chorus]
If your world falls apart
I'd start a riot
If night falls in your heart
I'd light the fire
In the dark, when you sound the alarm
We'll find each other's arms
For your love, all you are
I'd start a riot

[Verse 2]
I will wade through the fire and smoke like sunlight through the haze
I will fight till their flag waves white until my dying days
Through the bombs and blasts
We will take it back
You might also like[Chorus]
If your world falls apart
I'd start a riot
If night falls in your heart
I'd light the fire
In the dark, when you sound the alarm
We'll find each other's arms
For your love, all you are
I'd start a riot

[Bridge]
I'd start, I'd start a riot
I'd start, I'd start a riot
I'd start, I'd start a riot
I'd start, I'd start a riot

[Outro]
Ooh
Ooh
If your world falls apart
I'd start a riot8Embed

songs.title: Shine A Light

description.plain:
Serves as his debut single under Island Records.

The song, according to BANNERS, is about feeling lost at sea and desperately searching for a beacon of light, and waiting for that one big wave to finally pull you under while clinging on to that one last ray of hope. It’s a song to the person in your life that offers salvation while the storm is raging around you.

body.plain:
Serves as his debut single under Island Records.

The song, according to BANNERS, is about feeling lost at sea and desperately searching for a beacon of light, and waiting for that one big wave to finally pull you under while clinging on to that one last ray of hope. It’s a song to the person in your life that offers salvation while the storm is raging around you.

songs.lyrics:
20 ContributorsShine A Light Lyrics[Verse 1]
Light will lead the way to set you free
Cause I'm only looking for a little peace
And when the night falls
Oh call on me
Just don't forget to show me some mercy
Ooh, say you're mine
Ooh, take me higher

[Chorus]
(Woah) shine a light on
Shine a light on me
(Woah) shine a light on
Shine a light on me
I was lost at sea
While the waves were dragging me underneath
(Woah) shine a light on
Shine a light on me

[Verse 2]

If I could hear your voice
How sweet the sound
Ooh, say you're mine
Ooh, take me higher
